text: Three ships of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary have borne the name RFA Appleleaf: * was a tanker launched in 1916 as RFA Texol, renamed RFA Appleleaf in 1917 and broken up in 1947. * was a tanker launched in 1955 as George Lyras. She was purchased by the RFA in 1959 and returned to her owners in 1970. * RFA Appleleaf (A79) was a Leaf-class tanker launched in 1975 as Hudson Cavalier and taken into service in 1979. She was leased to the Royal Australian Navy in 1989 as , and was sold to them in 1994. Category:Royal Fleet Auxiliary ship names
title: RFA Appleleaf
